title: Cleg Kelly, Arab of the City
author: Crockett, Samuel Rutherford.
snippet: So it was at this most faA'ourable of times that Cleaver's boy's kitchen-maid approached her master with her request. It was just at the critical moment when the Bailie was laying aside the Convener and host, and donning the Morrison Street plumber with the garden coat which carried so strong an atmosphere of Bogie roll.
